<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>Trainer Setup</title>
</head>
<body>
  <form action="/submit" method="POST">
    <label for="name">Trainer's Name:</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required><br><br>
    
    <label for="age">Age:</label>
    <select id="age" name="age">
      <!-- Age options from 1 to 99 will be generated by JavaScript -->
    </select><br><br>
    
    <label for="creatureName">Creature Name:</label>
    <input type="text" id="creatureName" name="creatureName" required><br><br>
    
    <input type="submit" value="Submit">
  </form>

  <script>
    // Generate age options from 1 to 99
    var ageSelect = document.getElementById('age');
    for (var i = 1; i <= 99; i++) {
      var option = document.createElement('option');
      option.value = i;
      option.text = i;
      ageSelect.appendChild(option);
    }
  </script>
</body>
</html>
